text: Futhi labo abangakholwanga bathi, “asisoze sikholelwe kuleQur’an ngisho noma kulokho okungaphambilini kwayo”, futhi uma ungazibona izoni zimisiwe ngaphambili kweNkosi yazo, ezinye zazo ziphendukela kwezinye ngezwi (lokusola), labo ababenziwe buthakathaka bayothi kulabo ababeqhosha “ukube kwakungesingenxa yenu sasizoba ngabakholwayo”
